text: WSPM (89.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Cloverdale, Indiana. The station is owned by Inter Mirifica, Inc., and airs a Catholic radio format. The station was assigned the WSPM call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on September 27, 2002. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * SPM Category:Radio stations established in 2003 Category:2003 establishments in Indiana SPM Category:Putnam County, Indiana
title: WSPM
